title: People in Napoli Learn the Facts About Falun Gong | Falun Dafa - Minghui.org
text: (Minghui.org) Falun Gong (also called Falun Dafa) practitioners in Italy held introductory activities in the Vomero District of Napoli, the third largest city in Italy, on March 24, 2024. Many local residents were informed about the benefits of Falun Gong and became interested. Practitioners also exposed the Chinese Communist Party’s (CCP) persecution of Falun Gong. [Falun Gong practitioners held introductory activities in the Vomero District of Napoli, Italy.](/u/article_images/2024-3-26-italy-vomero-01.jpg) Despite the cold weather, many pedestrians stopped to read the display boards, talked with Falun Gong practitioners, and condemned the CCP’s brutal violations of human rights. They were astonished to learn that practitioners following the principles of Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance had been imprisoned, tortured, and their organs harvested for transplant surgeries. [Falun Gong practitioners tell people the facts about their cultivation practice.](/u/article_images/2024-3-26-italy-vomero-06.jpg) Many thanked the practitioners for telling them what was happening in China. A woman journalist asked for Falun Gong group exercise times and locations, and wanted to learn the exercises. Copyright © 2024 Minghui.org. All rights reserved.
